channel.title: Stackable items?
channel.description:
Anybody know how to make an item stackable?
(++) if you help me :D.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 20, 2006, 12:11:25 PM[/size][hr]Up....there was a tutorial on this, but it got deleted when Pwnd deleted everything.
So it's possible.

item.dc:creator: @ChillScape ChillScape!

@ChillScape wrote:

well then dont freakin leech if you dont know how and btw what source you using and it much be some were in client.java just look for a stakable item and it will prob help best i can offer to you :s sorry

item.title: Stackable items?
item.dc:creator: @Not_Pwnd Not Pwnd
item.description:
@Not_Pwnd wrote:

uk_dragon:

Note them? Put the iteams in your bank then note them and they will be on top of eachother, if there the same iteam and theres 2 or more.

ROFLS!!! I LOVE YOU… You made my day :]

Read full topic

item.title: Stackable items?
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

[quote=“ilyaostr9, post:11, topic:19132”]yeh, it’s called, BANKNOTES

ZOMFGHAX[/quote]

GET THE HELL OUT.

FOR THE LAST FREAKING TIME, NOT ALL ITEMS ARE NOTEABLE.

The thing about most of you 10 Y/O’s is, you think you know everything. Thanks to those of you who actually are trying to help me out, but for God’s Sake, you think I would know how to note an item, eh?

For those of you who don’t understand what I mean, do this.

In-game, enter ::pickup 0019 1. Bank that. Click on “Note”. Withdraw it. Now for you idiots telling me to note them, post what you figure out, k?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 23, 2006, 05:56:25 PM[/size][hr]Up.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 23, 2006, 08:10:50 PM[/size][hr]Up.

Read full topic
